work-1.text: I.. I am so dead! Can someone help this pitiful me..
..I promised to send these ${item}s to this person ..but I can't travel to ${name} right now.
I will pay ${amount} as reward.. but it must be delivered within ${days}.

work-1-accept.text: That's great! I am counting on you now.

work-1-decline.text: Oh no.. What am I gonna do..

work-1-completed.text: I really appreciate your help! It's all for me.. Thanks..
..I will not forget your kindness.. This is the promised reward.

work-1-failed.text: Oh no! We are out of time
Thank you for your help. But, it's too late.

work-2.text: Hey young people! It's good to see you. I am having a difficulty. Can you help me on this?
I need your help on a task. Within ${days}, deliver these ${item}s to ${name}.
In this troubled times, I really can't do this on my own. Please, help me.. Reward is ${amount}.
What do you think? Will you help me?

work-2-accept.text: Oh really? You will help me?
Thank you very much, young people. I will not forget the favor you are doing me!

work-2-decline.text: Oh you can't help.. I guess you have your reasons..

work-2-completed.text: It has finally arrived! Thank you so much! You have saved my day!

work-2-failed.text: Too bad. I really can't wait any longer.

work-3.text: Soldier. Hey Soldier! I have a job for you..
Within ${days}, can you deliver these ${item}s to ${name}?
There will be reward. I am going to pay you ${amount}. Will you aceept?

work-3-accept.text: Great. You accepted it. Everything is on you now.

work-3-decline.text: Oh ok. Too bad you can't accept it..

work-3-completed.text: Haha, it is delivered finally. Ok, this is your reward.
It's not a big deal, take it.

work-3-failed.text: This is awful.. Since it's not delivered as promised, I can't pay you the reward.
These are all based on the contract. Let's see if we have another opportunity next time.

work-4.text: Finally someone has come. Anyway, please deliver these ${item}s to ${name}.
It is in a hurry.. but I can't do it right now..
It must be delivered within ${days}.. I will pay you ${amount} as reward.

work-4-accept.text: Thank you. Finally someone can help me on this.

work-4-completed.text: It has arrived at last! I really appreciate your help.
Hey. This is the reward you deserved. Please take it.

work-4-failed.text: I am disappointed.. Time is over.. There is no point to continue the delivery.

work-5.text: Ha~ha, you came at the right time. There is a job for you. Of course, you also came because of me right?

work-5-approach.text: Ha~ha, for a cute lady like me, of course.

work-5-avoid.text: What? Are you pretending you didn't hear me? I can't believe in this world someone would decline me.

work-5-part2.text: Haha! OK, I am going to tell you.
Of course it has to be finished within ${days}.
I am going to pay you ${amount}. How's that? Accept?

work-5-accept.text: Haha! Thanks. Hey! Let's go now.

work-5-decline.text: You are pissing me off! Be gone!

work-5-completed.text: I have waiting for so long. But anyway, you keep your promise..
According to the contract, here is your reward ${reward}G.

work-5-failed.text: Ok. Our contract is terminated. You need to compensate me with the penalty fee, and then, get out of my way!

work-6.text: I heard good things about your team.
How about this offer? Deliver these ${item}s to ${name} and I will reward you ${amount}.
Deadline is ${days}. If you finish on time, I am going to double the reward.
It's a pretty sweet deal. Do you want to try?

work-6-accept.text: Great! Let's go then. I will pay the reward once it's delievered.

work-6-decline.text: Ok! I have nothing more to say then.

work-6-failed.text: It's slow! It's too slow! Unforgivable! You are going to pay me penalty fee!
Useless people like you need to learn a lesson. Hey, pay me ${penalty}G as compensation.
Our contract is terminated. Be gone!
